title: Quantum Technologies
description: Introduction to quantum information systems, with an emphasis on the physics (superconductivity, ion and atom trapping, quantum dots) behind the leading candidate platforms.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PHYS 3143 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 4782 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 4782 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
